card.name: Acidic Sliver
card.text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: This permanent deals 2 damage to target creature or player."

card.name: Amok
card.text: {1}, Discard a card at random: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Awakening
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, untap all creatures and lands.

card.name: Bandage
card.text: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Bottomless Pit
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card at random.

card.name: Brush with Death
card.text: Buyback {2}{B}{B} Target opponent loses 2 life. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Bullwhip
card.text: {2}, {T}: Bullwhip deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Burgeoning
card.text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Calming Licid
card.text: {W}, {T}: Calming Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {W} to end this effect. Enchanted creature can't attack.

card.name: Cannibalize
card.text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Exile one of those creatures and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.

card.name: Carnassid
card.text: Trample {1}{G}: Regenerate Carnassid.

card.name: Change of Heart
card.text: Buyback {3} Target creature can't attack this turn.

card.name: Cloud Spirit
card.text: Flying Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Constant Mists
card.text: Buyback - Sacrifice a land. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Contemplation
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Contempt
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, return it and Contempt to their owners' hands at end of combat.

card.name: Conviction
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.

card.name: Convulsing Licid
card.text: {R}, {T}: Convulsing Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {R} to end this effect. Enchanted creature can't block.

card.name: Corrupting Licid
card.text: {B}, {T}: Corrupting Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect. Enchanted creature has fear.

card.name: Craven Giant
card.text: Craven Giant can't block.

card.name: Crossbow Ambush
card.text: Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn.

card.name: Crovax the Cursed
card.text: Crovax the Cursed enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax. {B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Crystalline Sliver
card.text: All Slivers have shroud.

card.name: Dauthi Trapper
card.text: {T}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn.

card.name: Death Stroke
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Dream Halls
card.text: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.

card.name: Dream Prowler
card.text: Dream Prowler can't be blocked as long as it's attacking alone.

card.name: Duct Crawler
card.text: {1}{R}: Target creature can't block Duct Crawler this turn.

card.name: Dungeon Shade
card.text: Flying {B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Elven Rite
card.text: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

card.name: Endangered Armodon
card.text: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.

card.name: Ensnaring Bridge
card.text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

card.name: Evacuation
card.text: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Fanning the Flames
card.text: Buyback {3} Fanning the Flames deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Flame Wave
card.text: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

card.name: Fling
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Fling, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.

card.name: Flowstone Blade
card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Hellion
card.text: Haste {0}: Flowstone Hellion gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Mauler
card.text: Trample {R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Flowstone Shambler
card.text: {R}: Flowstone Shambler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Foul Imp
card.text: Flying When Foul Imp enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life.

card.name: Furnace Spirit
card.text: Haste {R}: Furnace Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Gliding Licid
card.text: {U}, {T}: Gliding Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {U} to end this effect. Enchanted creature has flying.

card.name: Grave Pact
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Hammerhead Shark
card.text: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.

card.name: Heartstone
card.text: Activated abilities of creatures cost {1} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.

card.name: Heat of Battle
card.text: Whenever a creature blocks, Heat of Battle deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Hermit Druid
card.text: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Hesitation
card.text: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Hesitation and counter that spell.

card.name: Hibernation Sliver
card.text: All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."

card.name: Hidden Retreat
card.text: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by target instant or sorcery spell this turn.

card.name: Honor Guard
card.text: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Horn of Greed
card.text: Whenever a player plays a land, that player draws a card.

card.name: Hornet Cannon
card.text: {3}, {T}: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying and haste named Hornet onto the battlefield. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Intruder Alarm
card.text: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, untap all creatures.

card.name: Invasion Plans
card.text: All creatures block each turn if able. The attacking player chooses how each creature blocks each turn.

card.name: Jinxed Ring
card.text: Whenever a nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, Jinxed Ring deals 1 damage to you. Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Ring.

card.name: Lab Rats
card.text: Buyback {4} Put a 1/1 black Rat creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Lancers en-Kor
card.text: Trample {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Lancers en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

card.name: Leap
card.text: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Lowland Basilisk
card.text: Whenever Lowland Basilisk deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Mana Leak
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Mask of the Mimic
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Mask of the Mimic, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a card with the same name as target nontoken creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Megrim
card.text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Mind Games
card.text: Buyback {2}{U} Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Mind Peel
card.text: Buyback {2}{B}{B} Target player discards a card.

card.name: Mindwarper
card.text: Mindwarper enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mindwarper: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Mob Justice
card.text: Mob Justice deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Mogg Bombers
card.text: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Mogg Bombers and it deals 3 damage to target player.

card.name: Mogg Flunkies
card.text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

card.name: Mogg Infestation
card.text: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature that died this way, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield under that player's control.

card.name: Mogg Maniac
card.text: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.

card.name: Morgue Thrull
card.text: Sacrifice Morgue Thrull: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Mortuary
card.text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put that card on top of your library.

card.name: Mox Diamond
card.text: If Mox Diamond would enter the battlefield, you may discard a land card instead. If you do, put Mox Diamond onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Mulch
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Nomads en-Kor
card.text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

card.name: Overgrowth
card.text: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G}{G} to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Portcullis
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if there are two or more other creatures on the battlefield, exile that creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control when Portcullis leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Primal Rage
card.text: Creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Provoke
card.text: Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able. Draw a card.

card.name: Pursuit of Knowledge
card.text: If you would draw a card, you may put a study counter on Pursuit of Knowledge instead. Remove three study counters from Pursuit of Knowledge, Sacrifice Pursuit of Knowledge: Draw seven cards.

card.name: Rabid Rats
card.text: {T}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ransack
card.text: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.

card.name: Rebound
card.text: Change the target of target spell that targets only a player. The new target must be a player.

card.name: Reins of Power
card.text: Untap all creatures you control and all creatures target opponent controls. You and that opponent each gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Revenant
card.text: Flying Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Rolling Stones
card.text: Wall creatures can attack as though they didn't have defender.

card.name: Ruination
card.text: Destroy all nonbasic lands.

card.name: Sacred Ground
card.text: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield.

card.name: Samite Blessing
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage."

card.name: Scapegoat
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Scapegoat, sacrifice a creature. Return any number of target creatures you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Seething Anger
card.text: Buyback {3} Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Serpent Warrior
card.text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Shaman en-Kor
card.text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Shaman en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead. {1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to Shaman en-Kor instead.

card.name: Shard Phoenix
card.text: Flying Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: Shard Phoenix deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Shifting Wall
card.text: Defender Shifting Wall enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Shock
card.text: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Sift
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Silver Wyvern
card.text: Flying {U}: Change the target of target spell or ability that targets only Silver Wyvern. The new target must be a creature.

card.name: Skeleton Scavengers
card.text: Skeleton Scavengers enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on Skeleton Scavengers: Regenerate Skeleton Scavengers. When it regenerates this way, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Skyshroud Archer
card.text: {T}: Target creature with flying gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Skyshroud Falcon
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Skyshroud Troopers
card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Sliver Queen
card.text: {2}: Put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Smite
card.text: Destroy target blocked creature.

card.name: Soltari Champion
card.text: Shadow Whenever Soltari Champion attacks, all other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Spike Breeder
card.text: Spike Breeder enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a 1/1 green Spike creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Spike Colony
card.text: Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Spike Feeder
card.text: Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

card.name: Spike Soldier
card.text: Spike Soldier enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Spike Soldier gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Spike Worker
card.text: Spike Worker enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Spindrift Drake
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Spindrift Drake unless you pay {U}.

card.name: Spined Sliver
card.text: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Spirit en-Kor
card.text: Flying {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

card.name: Spitting Hydra
card.text: Spitting Hydra enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spitting Hydra: Spitting Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Stronghold Assassin
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Stronghold Taskmaster
card.text: Other black creatures get -1/-1.

card.name: Sword of the Chosen
card.text: {T}: Target legendary creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Temper
card.text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Tempting Licid
card.text: {G}, {T}: Tempting Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect. All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

card.name: Thalakos Deceiver
card.text: Shadow Whenever Thalakos Deceiver attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, gain control of target creature.

card.name: Tidal Surge
card.text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

card.name: Tidal Warrior
card.text: {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

card.name: Torment
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

card.name: Tortured Existence
card.text: {B}, Discard a creature card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Verdant Touch
card.text: Buyback {3} Target land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land.

card.name: Victual Sliver
card.text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 4 life."

card.name: Volrath's Gardens
card.text: {2}, Tap an untapped creature you control: You gain 2 life. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Volrath's Laboratory
card.text: As Volrath's Laboratory enters the battlefield, choose a color and a creature type. {5}, {T}: Put a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type onto the battlefield.

card.name: Volrath's Shapeshifter
card.text: As long as the top card of your graveyard is a creature card, Volrath's Shapeshifter has the full text of that card and has the text "{2}: Discard a card." {2}: Discard a card.

card.name: Volrath's Stronghold
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Walking Dream
card.text: Walking Dream can't be blocked. Walking Dream doesn't untap during your untap step if an opponent controls two or more creatures.

card.name: Wall of Blossoms
card.text: Defender When Wall of Blossoms enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Wall of Essence
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Wall of Razors
card.text: Defender First strike

card.name: Wall of Souls
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.

card.name: Wall of Tears
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Tears blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.

card.name: Warrior Angel
card.text: Flying Whenever Warrior Angel deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Warrior en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
